title: Setup Booking Service Deployment
description: Configure and deploy the Booking Service microservice including Docker configuration, Kubernetes deployment, and CI/CD pipeline integration

user_stories: As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the Booking Service so it can be accessed by other services
As a developer, I want the service to be containerized so it can run consistently across environments
As an operations team member, I want the service to be monitored so I can track its performance
business_rules: Booking Service must be deployed as a containerized application
Service must be configured for high availability
Service must be integrated with monitoring and logging systems
Service must be deployed through CI/CD pipeline
edge_cases: Setting up health checks and readiness probes

acceptance_criteria: Booking Service Docker image is built and pushed to registry
Service is deployed to Kubernetes cluster
Health checks and monitoring are configured
CI/CD pipeline deploys service on code changes
Service is accessible through load balancer

integration_tests: Service responds to health check requests
Service can communicate with other services
e2e_tests: Complete deployment workflow from code commit to service availability

blocking_information.blocking_reason: Booking service implementation must be completed before deployment

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow existing patterns for Docker and Kubernetes configurations. Ensure proper resource limits and health checks. Configure environment variables for different deployment environments.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure secure container configuration. Implement proper network policies. Configure secrets management for sensitive configuration.
